Timeline

1989 — Time Berners Lee invents the browser

1993 — Marc Andreeseen and Eric Bina invents the first graphical browser, the Mosaic

1993 — Eric Meyer starts CSS

1994 — Jakob Nielsen starts User Experience and Usability research

1996 — Microsoft is launching Internet Explorer

1996 — Johnatan Gay creates Flash, an animation editor for web pages

1998 — Adobe Photoshop saves for web

1998 — The first Content Management System, Typo3 released

1998 — A List Apart, the magazine for web designers and developers is launched

1999 — Jason Kottke starts making hypertext products

1999 — Happy Cog, the iconic agency is launched

1999 — 37 Signals turns a designer into entrepreneur

2001 — Movable Type, the first blogging platform launched

2003 — Wordpress makes blogging easy

2003 — CSS Zen Garden brings visual enligthment for the web

2006 — Tumblr makes blogging more easy with microblogging

2007 — Facebook and Twitter intoducing social streams and networks

2010 — Shopify makes high quality web design affordable

2010 — Responsive Web Design for mobile and tablet started
